tasks.label: build
args: ""C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\BuildTools\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars64.bat" && cl.exe /EHsc /std:c++17 /Iinclude src\main.cpp src\Panel.cpp src\MasterData.cpp src\Station1UI.cpp src\Station2UI.cpp src\Gui.cpp /Fe:AVO_Invents_Automation.exe user32.lib gdi32.lib"
